verbose_text: gRNAs were cloned into the pCFD4 vector (Addgene 49411), and the resulting constructs were verified by sequencing before being sent for transgenesis by phiC31 site directed integration into attP40 and attP2 sites (BestGene Inc., or Department of Genetics, University of Cambridge).
evidence: directed integration into attP40 and attP2 sites
